MaxButtons.Name: Number of Buttons
MaxButtons.Hint: Sets the number of buttons to display in the calculator, increasing or decreasing the maximum roll it can calculate.

ScreenTheme.Name: Screen Theme
ScreenTheme.Hint: Choose the theme for the calculator screen. INDIGLO® is a registered trademark of Timex Group B.V. and its subsidiaries.

ScreenBrightness.Name: Screen Brightness
ScreenBrightness.Hint: Adjust the brightness of the screen.
